description:
Hey! 
We’re getting all Expats interested in meeting each other by Matosinhos, in Porto i/o Seaside! 
From our experience organizing the Porto Digital Nomads Meetup, we decided that it’s about time the Expats of the city get their own time and space to meet others that have gone through some of the same pains and joys of moving to a different country. 
You can expect some beers, snacks, and a lot of interesting people around to meet with awesome stories to share!
name: Porto Expats Meetup
